alert.note: Alert for McDuffie (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 1:43PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern McDuffie County through 215 PM EDT... At 142 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Thomson. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Thomson, Thomson-McDuffie County Airport, Dearing, Sweetwater Park, Arties Pond Public Fishing Area, McDuffie County Fire Department, Adamsville, Thomson Fire Department, McDuffie Regional Medical Center, University Hospital McDuffie, White Oak Campground, Autney, Boneville and Ansley Mill. This includes Interstate 20 in Georgia between mile markers 171 and 178. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
